input: How do I set up VPN on my Mac?
output: 1. Download GlobalProtect from the IT portal. 2. Install and open the application. 3. Enter vpn.company.com as the portal address. 4. Sign in with your SSO credentials. 5. Click Connect.

input: What is the onboarding checklist for new hires?
output: Day 1: Complete I-9 form, set up laptop, activate email. Week 1: Complete security training, meet team, review handbook. Month 1: Complete compliance training, first 1:1 with manager.
